SCRIPT.MSCRI:
:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_HEADER_PARAM_VALIDATION
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Siebel Server Url" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_SERVER_URL#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Siebel Server Port" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_PORT#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Siebel Enterprise" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_ENTERPRISE#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Object Manager" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_OBJECT_MANAGER#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Siebel Username" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_USER#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Siebel Password" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_PASSWORD#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Flow Search Specification" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_FLOW_SEARCH_SPEC#
:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_HEADER_EXECUTION !Begin my code
:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SIEBEL.PRV.INCLUDE.SET_SIEBEL_PROPERTIES :SET &COMMAND# = "java -jar siebeltool.jar siebel DeployWorkflow" :SET &COMMAND# = STR_CAT(&COMMAND#, ' -h &UC4RB_SIEBEL_SERVER_URL# -pt &UC4RB_SIEBEL_PORT#') :SET &COMMAND# = STR_CAT(&COMMAND#, ' -su &UC4RB_SIEBEL_USER# -sp &UC4RB_SIEBEL_PASSWORD#') :SET &COMMAND# = STR_CAT(&COMMAND#, ' -e "&UC4RB_SIEBEL_ENTERPRISE#" -om &UC4RB_SIEBEL_OBJECT_MANAGER#') :SET &UC4RB_SIEBEL_FLOWSEARCH_TMP# = STR_SUB(&UC4RB_SIEBEL_FLOW_SEARCH_SPEC#,'"','\"') :SET &COMMAND# = STR_CAT(&COMMAND#, ' -s "&UC4RB_SIEBEL_FLOWSEARCH_TMP#"') :SET &COMMAND# = STR_CAT(&COMMAND#, "&SIEBEL_PROPERTIES#") :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHANGE_FOLDER_TO_AGENT_BIN &COMMAND# :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_RETURN_CODE_UNIX_SHELL !End my code

POST_SCRIPT.OSCRI:
:SET &UC4RB_OUT_NUM_DEPLOYED_WF# = "0"
:SET &hnd# = PREP_PROCESS_REPORT(,, "REP", "*Number of workflow deployed: *") :PROCESS &hnd# : SET &line# = GET_PROCESS_LINE(&hnd#,1) : SET &LENGTH# = STR_FIND(&line#, "deployed: ") : SET &LENGTH# = &LENGTH# + 10 : SET &UC4RB_OUT_NUM_DEPLOYED_WF# = STR_CUT(&line#, &LENGTH#) :ENDPROCESS
:PUB &UC4RB_OUT_NUM_DEPLOYED_WF#,,TOP
